    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3415</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nobel Laureates: 1977- the Nobel Prize in Physiology or medicine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nobel Laureaten: 1977- der Nobelpreis in 
der Physiologie oder in der Medizin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lauréats Nobel : 1977- le prix Nobel dans 
la physiologie ou la médecine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Laureates De Nobel: 1977- o prêmio de 
nobel no physiology ou na medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Laureates Nobel: 1977- il premio Nobel 
nella fisiologia o nella medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δαφνοστεφές Νόμπελ: 1977- το βραβείο Νόμπελ 
στη φυσιολογία ή την ιατρική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Laureados Nobel: 1977- el premio Nobel en 
fisiología o medicina</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Information on the research done byRoger Guillemin and Andrew Schally which won them the Nobel Prize forThe peptide hormone production of the brain".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">peptide hormones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Nobel Prize</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen über das Forschung erfolgte 
byRoger Guillemin und Andrew Schally, die sie die Nobelpreis forThe 
Peptid-Hormonproduktion des Gehirns "gewannen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information sur le byRoger fait par recherche 
Guillemin et Andrew Schally qui les ont gagnées la production 
d'hormone de peptide de forThe de prix Nobel du cerveau ".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação no byRoger feito pesquisa Guillemin 
e Andrew Schally que os ganharam a produção do hormone do peptide do
forThe do prêmio de nobel do cérebro ".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni sul byRoger fatto ricerca 
Guillemin ed Andrew Schally che le hanno vinte la produzione 
dell'ormone del peptide del forThe del premio Nobel del cervello ".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες για το γίνοντα έρευνα byRoger 
Guillemin και Andrew Schally που τους κέρδισε η παραγωγή 
ορμονών πεπτιδίων βραβείων forThe Νόμπελ του εγκεφάλου ".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Información sobre el byRoger hecho 
investigación Guillemin y Andrew Schally que las ganaron la 
producción de la hormona del peptide del forThe del premio Nobel del 
cerebro ".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehirn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Peptidhormone</string>
          </keyword>
